column2: with Martin Billings--samples retrieved through hole in iced-over lake
Cloudy- cool day -- water fairly clear and settled
The secchi depth was 5'6" and the temp. F 71.9 @ surface- 70.5 @ 3' and 69.9 @ 6'.
Temp -- 6.4 ft = 63.6; 3 ft = 64.2; surface = 64.2 degrees f
Sunny- hot + humid past 4 days- three-fourths inches of rain last night
Sunny- calm- temps warming and dry for 3 weeks
Murky water- windy- air temp in 60's
Very cold the last several days
Cloudy- warm. last two weeks temps have been mid-80's. 2 days of 90. Dry mostly.
Temp  sensor broken -- Adams LWCD will get another
Partly cloudy- rain in the am. (.28")
sunny- but quite windy--air temp 68.3 F--aquatic plants from last year clearly visible
sunny and getting better- but some wind
sunny--4.5" of rain 3 days ago--temperatures running in the 90s F for last 5 days
cloudy + windy--10 inches of rain in the last 2 weeks
sunny- warm--2 inches of rain in the last week
cloudy--.8 inches of rain last night--lows in the 40s and 50s--highest in the 60s past week
Sunny- No rain in past week- temps mid 80's to low 90's past week
Sunny- calm- 1" rain on 7/25- temps high 80's to low 70's- temp low 60-51
Cloudy- 13" rain on 8/26- high temps 70's - low 80's- low temps 60's to 70's
